reference: Online complements to Heij, de Boer, Franses, Kloek, and van Dijk (2004).
title: Bank Wages
description:
Description
Wages of employees of a US bank.

parameters.job:
Ordered factor indicating job category, with levels "custodial",
"admin"  and "manage".
parameters.minority: Factor. Is the employee member of a minority?

format: A data frame containing 474 observations on 4 variables.
